gurmukhi: hiTXo swhbMcMd KyqM KqRIXwxM ] hny Kwn KUnI Kurwswn BwnM ]
transliteration: Hathiyo Saahabanchannd Khetan Khatrooyaanan|| Hane Khaan Khoonoo Khuraasaan Bhaanan||
translation: Sahib Chand, the valiant Kshatriya, killed a bloody Khan of Khorasan.

gurmukhi: qhwN bIr bMky BlI BwNiq mwry ] bcy pRwn lY ky ispwhI isDwry ]10]
transliteration: Tahaan Boor Banke Bhaloo Bhaant(i) Mdare|| Bache Praan Lai Ke Sipaahoo Sidhdare||10||
translation: He slew several graceful warriors, with full force; the soldiers who survived, fled away in order to save their lives.10.

gurmukhi: qhwN swh sMgRwm kIny AKwry ] Gny Kyq mo Kwn KUnI lqwry ]
transliteration: Tahaan Saah Sanraam Koone Akhdare|| Ghane Khet Mo Khaan Khoonoo Latdare||
translation: There (Sango) Shah exhibited his acts of bravery in the battlefield and trampled under feet many bloody Khans.

gurmukhi: niRpM gopwlXM Kro Kyq gwjY ] miRgw JuMf m`iDXM mno isMG rwjY ]11]
transliteration: Nripan Gopaalyan Kdaro Khet Gadjai|| Mrigad Jhound Maddhiyan Mano Singh Raajai||11||
translation: Gopal, the king of Guleria, stood firmly in the field and roared like a lion amidst a herd of deers.11.

gurmukhi: qhwN eyk bIrM hrI cMd kopXo ] BlI BwNiq so Koq mo pwv ropXo ]
transliteration: Tahaan Ek Booran Daroo Channd Kopyo|| Bhaloo Bhaant(i) So Khet Mo Paav Ropyo||
translation: There in great fury, a warrior Hari Chand, very skillfully took position in the battlefield.

gurmukhi: mhw kRoD kY qIr qIKy pHwry ] lgY jOn ky qwih pwrY pDwry ]12]
transliteration: Mahaa Krodh Kai Toor Tookhe Prahdare|| Lagad Jaoun Ke Taah(i) Pdarai Padhdare||12||
translation: He discharged sharp arrows in great rage and whosoever was struck, left for the other world.12.
Hari Chand (Handooria) in great fury, killed significant heroes.

gurmukhi: Bly bwx bwhy ] bfy sYn gwhy ]13]
transliteration: Bhale Baan Baahe|| Bade Sain Gadhe||13||
translation: He shot skillfully a volley of arrows and killed a lot of forces.13.

gurmukhi: rsM ru`dR rwcy ] mhw loh mwcy ]
transliteration: Rasan Ruddra Raache|| Mahaa Loh Maache||
translation: He was absorbed in dreadful feat of arms.

gurmukhi: hny ssqR DwrI ] ilty BUp BwrI ]14]
transliteration: Hane Sastra Dhdaroo|| Lite Bhoop Bhdaroo||14||
translation: Armed warriors were being killed and great kings were falling on the ground.14.

gurmukhi: qbY jIqm`lM ] hrIcMd B`lM ] hiRdY AYNc mwirE ] su Kyq auqwirE ]15]
transliteration: Tabai Jeetmallan|| Daroochannd Bhallan|| Hridai Ainch Maario|| Su Khetan Outaario||15||
translation: Then Jit Mal aimed and struck Hari Chand down to the ground with his spear.15.

gurmukhi: lgy bIr bwxM ] irisXo qyij mwxM ]
transliteration: Lage Boor Baanan|| Risiyo Tej(i) Maanan||
translation: The warriors struck with arrows became red with blood.
Their horses feel and they left for heavens.16.
